exercises.name: Push-ups
exercises.description: A basic bodyweight movement that targets the chest, shoulders, and triceps.

exercises.name: Air Squats
exercises.description: Lower body exercise focused on quads, glutes, and hamstrings.

exercises.name: Burpees
exercises.description: A full-body movement combining a squat, push-up, and jump.

exercises.name: Kettlebell Swings
exercises.description: An explosive hip-hinge movement that builds posterior chain strength and endurance.

exercises.name: Dumbbell Thrusters
exercises.description: A squat into a push press using dumbbells, targeting legs and shoulders.

exercises.name: Wall Balls
exercises.description: A squat followed by a throw of a medicine ball to a target.

exercises.name: Double Unders
exercises.description: Jump rope movement where the rope passes under the feet twice per jump.

exercises.name: Pull-ups
exercises.description: Upper-body movement pulling your chin over the bar.

exercises.name: Sit-ups
exercises.description: Core exercise involving flexion of the torso from a lying position.

exercises.name: Box Jumps
exercises.description: An explosive jump onto a box to build power and agility.

exercises.description: Core-focused gymnastic movement where toes touch the pull-up bar.

exercises.description: Classic strength lift pulling a barbell from ground to standing.

exercises.description: Olympic lift to pull a barbell to shoulders in one movement.

exercises.description: Squat with barbell held in front rack position.

exercises.name: Push Press
exercises.description: Press barbell overhead using a small leg drive.

exercises.name: Snatch
exercises.description: Olympic lift moving barbell from ground to overhead in one motion.

exercises.name: Clean and Jerk
exercises.description: Olympic lift combining clean to shoulders and overhead jerk.

exercises.name: Lunges
exercises.description: Alternating step-forward exercise to strengthen legs and balance.

exercises.name: Handstand Push-ups
exercises.description: Upside-down push-ups performed against a wall.

exercises.name: Rowing (cal)

exercises.description: A 400-meter run to challenge your cardiovascular capacity.

exercises.name: Jumping Lunges
exercises.description: Explosive lunge variation alternating legs mid-air.

exercises.name: Bear Crawls

exercises.name: Mountain Climbers

exercises.name: Hollow Hold (20s)
exercises.description: Gymnastics core hold with shoulders and legs off ground.

exercises.name: Jump Rope Singles
exercises.description: Single jump per rope rotation for conditioning.

exercises.name: Ring Rows
exercises.description: Horizontal pulling movement using gymnastic rings.

exercises.name: Ring Dips
exercises.description: Upper-body pressing movement performed on gymnastic rings.

exercises.name: Wall Walks
exercises.description: Crawl up a wall into handstand and return.

exercises.name: Pistol Squats
